Blackfang nodded and transformed to beast mode. He ran along the 
others.

Blackfang: So, this means we fire on predacons, but not on the other 
guys, unless they insist, right, Rodimus?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk finally arrives at the Pred base.  He transforms in the air 
> and fires his plasma canon at Megatron.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > ::Rodimus Prime::
> > 
> > "Ok, Blackfang, we are going to attack the Predacon base. I hope 
> you are prepared!"
> > 
> > He continues on.
